attributes.action: Removing the salary cap from AHP in NHS.
attributes.additional_details: It’s vital that the employer keeps the fair wages to those who are willing to offer bank work. Failure to do can discourage our frontline AHP to support shortage of staff in this critical moment.
attributes.background: Government to remove cap from the salary of AHP’s if they offer bank work.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is an operational decision for the NHS.
